snippet: It would be hard to argue that any other player has been more important to his team than John Tavares, who has worked in relative obscurity on Long Island.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and STU HACKEL

lead_paragraph: It would be hard to argue that any other player has been more important to his team than John Tavares, who has worked in relative obscurity on Long Island.

headline.seo: John Tavares Quietly Making Case for Hart Trophy
headline.main: John Tavares Quietly Making Case for Hart Trophy
headline.print_headline: Not in Spotlight but in Running
